container-title: ... The Soviet Union , far from undermining the strength of the Indonesian Republic , is rendering us assistance. The Soviet Union wishes Indonesia to become strong
note: “ The Soviet Union granted Indonesia credits totaling approxi mately 800 million dollars. The friendship between the Soviet Union and Indonesia lives in the hearts of our peoples.”
title: The imperialists asked us : ' Why are you friends with the Soviet Union ? The Soviet Union will oppress you. The Soviet Union is an imperialist country, a country of red imperialists.' “ I replied: “ Why shouldn't we be friends with the Soviet Union ? Isn't the Soviet Union helping us , isn't the Soviet Union struggling against imperialists and isn't it leading this struggle ? And isn't the Soviet Union helping us in the United Nations and in building up our country and our armed forces ? That's why the Soviet Union is our friend .'
